text: Norbert Walter-Borjans (born 17 September 1952) is a German economist and politician. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany. He was the leader of the party from 2019 to 2021. He was the minister of finance of the federal state of North Rhine-Westphalia from 2010 until 2017.Madeline Chambers (September 4, 2019), German Social Democrats start "speed-dating" for aspiring leaders Reuters. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1952 births Category:German economists Category:Politicians from North Rhine- Westphalia
title: Norbert Walter-Borjans
